channel.title: Help 317 Server, Paying £££ For Help
channel.description:
I Downloaded "Denise Pking V5" Recently, I Extracted And Ran Source, Had A Look Around.. I Need Help On The Following Problems:
1. Save User's Account, I.E (When I Log In And Get 99 Stats And Items, When I Log Out Again It Resets To 1 And Nothing In Bank.)
2. Move NPC's.
3. Sort The Item Thing Out, E.g ::Item 4561 3 (I Want Only Admin's To Be Able To Do That)
4. Once An User Logs In They Will Instantly Have 200m Of Items, I Only Want Users To Have 5 Sets Of Everything Which Is Already In Bank
Anyone Who Can Solve The Following Will Be Rewarded, With Auto-Admin + £30
Many Thanks. ~Baz

item.title: Help 317 Server, Paying £££ For Help
item.dc:creator: @Baz Baz
item.description:
@Baz wrote:

I Downloaded “Denise Pking V5” Recently, I Extracted And Ran Source, Had A Look Around…
I Need Help On The Following Problems:

  1. Save User’s Account, I.E (When I Log In And Get 99 Stats And Items, When I Log Out Again It Resets To 1 And Nothing In Bank.)

  2. Move NPC’s.

  3. Sort The Item Thing Out, E.g ::Item 4561 3 (I Want Only Admin’s To Be Able To Do That)

  4. Once An User Logs In They Will Instantly Have 200m Of Items, I Only Want Users To Have 5 Sets Of Everything Which Is Already In Bank

Anyone Who Can Solve The Following Will Be Rewarded, With Auto-Admin + £30

Many Thanks.
~Baz
